Assassin's Shroud.name: Assassin's Shroud
Assassin's Shroud.flavor: You cause invisible shrouds to settle on your foe. At your command, the shrouds reveal the target’s weak points to your keen gaze.
Assassin's Shroud.target: One enemy you can see in the burst
Assassin's Shroud.effect:
You subject the target to your shroud. If any of your shrouds are already on the target, you subject it to an additional shroud, up to a maximum of four. The shrouds last until you use this power against a different enemy or until the end of the encounter.
    Before you make an attack roll against the target, you choose to invoke either all your shrouds on it or none of them. If you invoke your shrouds, the attack deals 1d6 damage per shroud, minus one shroud if the attack misses, and all your shrouds then vanish from the target. This damage roll never benefits from bonuses to damage rolls, and is in addition to the attack’s damage, if any.
    Level 11: 1d6 + 3 damage per shroud.
    Level 21: 1d6 + 6 damage per shroud.
Assassin's Shroud.special: You can use this power only on your turn and only once per turn.

Shadow Step.name: Shadow Step
Shadow Step.flavor: You vanish into the shadow energy around one creature and then step out of it near another creature.
Shadow Step.requirement: You must be adjacent to a creature.
Shadow Step.effect:
You teleport 3 squares to a square adjacent to a different creature.
    Level 11: Teleport 4 squares.
    Level 21: Teleport 5 squares.

Shade Form.name: Shade Form
Shade Form.flavor: You transform yourself into a being of shadow, becoming more difficult to notice and to harm.
Shade Form.effect: You assume a shadowy form that lasts until you make an attack roll or until the end of your next turn. While in this form, you are insubstantial, and you gain vulnerable 5 radiant. In addition, you can make Stealth checks to become hidden if you have any cover or concealment, and you can use cover granted by your allies both to become hidden and to remain hidden.

Executioner's Noose.name: Executioner's Noose
Executioner's Noose.flavor: You gather shadows into the form of a noose, cast it around your foe’s neck, and pull.
Executioner's Noose.onHit:
1d6 + Dexterity modifier force damage, and you pull the target 2 squares. The target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
    Level 21: 2d6 + Dexterity modifier force damage.

Inescapable Blade.name: Inescapable Blade
Inescapable Blade.flavor: You stop several feet away from your foe and slash with your weapon. Your weapon’s shadow closes the distance, and mundane obstacles do not slow it.
Inescapable Blade.attack: Dexterity vs. AC. The attack ignores cover and superior cover.

Leaping Shade.name: Leaping Shade
Leaping Shade.flavor: As your weapon makes contact, the shrouds you have placed on your victim dig cruelly into its flesh.
Leaping Shade.onHit:
1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. If you didn’t invoke your shrouds on the target, it takes 1 extra damage for each of your shrouds on it.
    Level 21: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and 2 extra damage for each of your shrouds on the target.

Shadow Storm.name: Shadow Storm
Shadow Storm.flavor: Your tie to the Shadowfell calls on the living shadows around your foe, causing them to claw at it as you make your attack.
Shadow Storm.onHit:
1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, plus 1 damage for each creature adjacent to the target.
    Level 21: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, plus 2 damage for each creature adjacent to the target.

Gloom Thief.name: Gloom Thief
Gloom Thief.flavor: As you slash at your foe, you seize part of its shadow, which you use to hide yourself from your enemies’ eyes.
Gloom Thief.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, you are invisible while within 2 squares of the target.

Nightmare Shades.name: Nightmare Shades
Nightmare Shades.flavor: The darkness in the corner of your foe’s eyes shifts and moves, causing it to glance about in terror. In its panic, it forgets the true threat to its life.
Nightmare Shades.onHit: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier psychic damage, and the target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.
Nightmare Shades.nightStalker: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a power bonus to damage rolls against the target equal to your Charisma modifier.

Shadow Darts.name: Shadow Darts
Shadow Darts.flavor: You launch a volley of chilling darts of shadow energy at your foe.
Shadow Darts.attack: Dexterity vs. Reflex. Make three attack rolls. If any of them hit, resolve them as a single hit, and all of them must miss for the attack to miss.
Shadow Darts.onHit: 1d8 cold damage if one of the attack rolls hits, 2d8 cold damage if two hit, or 3d8 cold damage if three hit.

Smothering Shadow.name: Smothering Shadow
Smothering Shadow.flavor: You stab at your foe and channel shadow magic into its body, causing its own shadow to hinder it.
Smothering Shadow.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Smothering Shadow.bleakDisciple: The target takes extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Grave Spike.name: Grave Spike
Grave Spike.flavor: As you strike your foe, your weapon shoots hundreds of tiny shadow spikes into it, wracking it with pain.
Grave Spike.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and ongoing 5 damage (save ends). Whenever the target takes this ongoing damage, the target falls prone.
Grave Spike.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against the target while your shrouds are on it.

Strangling Shadow.name: Strangling Shadow
Strangling Shadow.flavor: Your attack distracts your foe with pain just long enough for you to weave a noose of shadows around its neck.
Strangling Shadow.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target takes ongoing 5 damage and is immobilized (save ends both).
Strangling Shadow.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).
Strangling Shadow.effect: Until the target saves against this power, you can pull the target 3 squares as a free action once during each of your turns.

Targeted for Death.name: Targeted for Death
Targeted for Death.flavor: A black dart streaks from your hand to strike the target, surrounding it in a warmth-stealing gloom.
Targeted for Death.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you use assassin’s shroud against the target, you subject it to two shrouds instead of one.

Terrifying Visage.name: Terrifying Visage
Terrifying Visage.flavor: Your face distorts into a horrid visage, which drives your foes before you, but leaves one victim rooted in place.
Terrifying Visage.primaryTarget: One creature adjacent to you in the blast
Terrifying Visage.onHit: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier psychic damage, and the primary target is immobilized (save ends).
Terrifying Visage.onMiss: Half damage, and the primary target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Terrifying Visage.secondaryTarget: Each creature other than the primary target in the blast
Terrifying Visage.secondaryOnHit: You push the secondary target 4 squares.
Terrifying Visage.secondaryOnMiss: You push the secondary target 2 squares.

Cat's Trickery.name: Cat's Trickery
Cat's Trickery.flavor: You plunge the room into darkness at the same time that your eyes pierce those shadows.
Cat's Trickery.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you both gain darkvision and douse one light source that is within 10 squares of you and no larger than a lantern.

Cloak of Shades.name: Cloak of Shades
Cloak of Shades.flavor: A shadowy haze swirls around you, hiding you from view.
Cloak of Shades.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain concealment against all creatures and are invisible to creatures that are more than 5 squares away from you.

Lurking Shadow.name: Lurking Shadow
Lurking Shadow.flavor: You meld with the shadows, allowing you to spy on your enemies without fear of discovery.
Lurking Shadow.requirement: You must be in dim light or darkness.
Lurking Shadow.effect: You become invisible and silent until the end of your next turn, until you move more than 2 squares on your turn, or until you enter a square of bright light. If a creature tries to enter your space before the effect ends, you can either shift 1 square as a free action or remain where you are. If you remain where you are, the effect ends.

Shadowed Legion.name: Shadowed Legion
Shadowed Legion.flavor: Your shadow lengthens to veil your allies from your foes.
Shadowed Legion.effect: Until the stance ends, allies within 5 squares of you can use your Stealth modifier for their Stealth checks.

Army of the Night.name: Army of the Night
Army of the Night.flavor: Your shadow magic spawns a phantom mob in your foe’s mind, and the mob spurs the foe to strike out at its allies in terror.
Army of the Night.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target makes a melee basic attack as an opportunity action against any enemy that ends its turn adjacent to the target.
Army of the Night.nightStalker: The target makes the attack with a power bonus to attack rolls equal to your Charisma modifier.

Cloaking Mist.name: Cloaking Mist
Cloaking Mist.flavor: You draw the stuff of shadows to your hands and cast it forth, creating cold, black mist that chokes your enemies and gives you a chance to vanish.
Cloaking Mist.effect: Until the end of your turn, you can make a Stealth check to hide from the targets even if you have only cover or concealment against them.

Inescapable Shadow.name: Inescapable Shadow
Inescapable Shadow.flavor: You step from your foe’s shadow, driving your blade into the foe before it can make a sound.
Inescapable Shadow.effect: Before the attack, you teleport 5 squares to a square adjacent to your assassin’s shroud target.

Nightshade's Kiss.name: Nightshade's Kiss
Nightshade's Kiss.flavor: Your strike infects your foe’s mind, causing the foe to recoil from every attack.
Nightshade's Kiss.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the target 2 squares. Until the end of your next turn, you can slide the target 1 square as a free action whenever the target is hit.
Nightshade's Kiss.bleakDisciple: The number of squares you slide the target increases by 1.

Heart of Dust.name: Heart of Dust
Heart of Dust.flavor: Shadow venom courses through your target, causing it to shed a gray dust that chokes nearby enemies.
Heart of Dust.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends). Whenever the target takes this ongoing damage, each enemy within 2 squares of it takes 5 poison damage.
Heart of Dust.onMiss: Half damage, and each enemy within 2 squares of the target takes 3 poison damage.

Shadow Soul.name: Shadow Soul
Shadow Soul.flavor: You tear away a piece of your foe’s shadow and tuck it into the hollow in your soul. You can sense your foe now and step from its shadow at will.
Shadow Soul.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +5 power bonus to Perception checks against the target.
Shadow Soul.sustainMinor: The power bonus persists, and if the target is not hidden from you, you teleport 20 squares to a square adjacent to it.

Treacherous Shades.name: Treacherous Shades
Treacherous Shades.flavor: You seize control of your enemies’ shadows, which rattle the enemies by turning on them.
Treacherous Shades.onHit: 2d6 + Dexterity modifier psychic damage, and the target grants combat advantage (save ends). Until the target saves against this effect, enemies grant combat advantage while adjacent to the target.
Treacherous Shades.onMiss: Half damage, and the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Twilight Assassin.name: Twilight Assassin
Twilight Assassin.flavor: Your shadow leaps from you to attack your enemies, and the two of you fight as one.
Twilight Assassin.onHit: 3 damage, or 6 damage if the secondary target is your assassin’s shroud target.
Twilight Assassin.effect: You conjure a shadowy duplicate of yourself in an unoccupied square adjacent to the primary target. The duplicate occupies its space, and it lasts until the end of the encounter. Whenever you use a move action, you can also move the duplicate 5 squares. You can flank enemies with the duplicate, but your allies cannot. Until the duplicate vanishes, it can use the Twilight Assassin Attack power.
Twilight Assassin.requirement: The power Twilight Assassin must be active in order to use this power.

Darting Shadow.name: Darting Shadow
Darting Shadow.flavor: You leap from one hiding spot to the next, remaining hidden from view thanks to your mastery of shadow magic.
Darting Shadow.effect: You move your speed. You remain hidden from each enemy against which you have cover, superior cover, concealment, or total concealment at the end of the movement.

Sheltering Dark.name: Sheltering Dark
Sheltering Dark.flavor: Shadows move to surround you and provide you with a spot from which to watch your enemies without fear of detection.
Sheltering Dark.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. You have concealment while you are within the zone. When you leave the zone, you become invisible until the end of your turn.

Slayer's Escape.name: Slayer's Escape
Slayer's Escape.flavor: After you are struck, you fold shadows around yourself and disappear.
Slayer's Escape.trigger: You are hit by an attack
Slayer's Escape.effect: You teleport 5 squares, and you become invisible until the start of your next turn.

Slithering Shadow.name: Slithering Shadow
Slithering Shadow.flavor: You move like a shadow in a flickering light, slipping from one spot to another in the blink of an eye.
Slithering Shadow.effect: Until the stance ends, you can shift 1 square as a minor action.

Captured Shadow.name: Captured Shadow
Captured Shadow.flavor: As you strike your foe, you steal its shadow. In a moment, you can teleport your foe back to your side.
Captured Shadow.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. Once before the end of your next turn, you can use a free action to teleport the target to a square adjacent to you. That square cannot be hindering terrain.

Echoing Threat.name: Echoing Threat
Echoing Threat.flavor: Your foe sees threats in every corner and betrayal in every eye. If it cannot escape the press of the crowd, it will go mad.
Echoing Threat.onHit: 1d10 + Dexterity modifier psychic damage. At the end of its next turn, the target takes 10 psychic damage if any creatures are within 2 squares of it.
Echoing Threat.nightStalker: During your next turn, you can teleport a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier as a minor action. You must end the teleportation closer to the target.

Shadow Jack.name: Shadow Jack
Shadow Jack.flavor: You strike your foe and then merge with its shadow. Your enemies’ attacks pass through you and hit your foe instead.
Shadow Jack.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you shift 1 square into the target’s space and remain there until the start of your next turn. While there, you are insubstantial, you move with the target (this movement doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks), and any melee or ranged attack that misses you hits the target instead, unless the target is the attacker. At the start of your next turn, you slide 1 square to a square adjacent to the target.

Shadow Link.name: Shadow Link
Shadow Link.flavor: Your attack forges a brief bond with your foe that allows you to shroud it with greater darkness each time you feel pain.
Shadow Link.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, you can use your assassin’s shroud against the target whenever you are hit.
Shadow Link.bleakDisciple: You gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier when the attack hits.

Black Garrote.name: Black Garrote
Black Garrote.flavor: A wisp of shadow stuff stretches between your hands. You loop it around your foe’s throat and transform the shadow into a material as hard as steel.
Black Garrote.onHit: You grab the target. Until the grab ends, the target takes a –5 penalty to all escape attempts and a –2 penalty to attack rolls against you. When the grab ends, the target takes 1d10 + your Dexterity modifier damage.
Black Garrote.sustainStandard: The grab persists, and the target takes 2d10 + your Dexterity modifier damage.
Black Garrote.special: You can instead sustain the grab as a minor action. If you do so, the power’s effect ends, and the grab becomes a normal grab.

Bound by Shadow.name: Bound by Shadow
Bound by Shadow.flavor: As your weapon pierces your foe, you send deadly shadow energy coursing into it, linking your two fates. When you are harmed, so is your foe.
Bound by Shadow.effect: Until the end of the encounter, the target takes 5 damage whenever an enemy, including the target, deals damage to you.

Obscuring Shadow.name: Obscuring Shadow
Obscuring Shadow.flavor: You slash at your foe, calling up shadows that blot you from its vision.
Obscuring Shadow.effect: The target cannot see you (save ends).

Wall of Shadows.name: Wall of Shadows
Wall of Shadows.flavor: You weave a skein of shadows that bites your enemies with a deathly chill.
Wall of Shadows.effect: You conjure a wall of darkness that lasts until the end of your next turn. The wall can be up to 2 squares high, and it blocks line of sight for creatures other than you. Any creature that enters the wall or starts its turn there takes 1d6 + your Dexterity modifier cold damage (a creature can take this damage only once per turn). If you are in the wall or adjacent to it, you can use a move action to teleport to another square in the wall or adjacent to it.

Mist Walk.name: Mist Walk
Mist Walk.flavor: For a moment, you are like a ghost passing through creatures and objects.
Mist Walk.effect: You shift 6 squares, and you gain phasing during the shift.

Promise of Retribution.name: Promise of Retribution
Promise of Retribution.flavor: When a foe attacks you, shadows spirit you away, and you take a small part of the foe’s being with you.
Promise of Retribution.effect: You teleport 10 squares. Once before the end of the encounter, you can use a move action to teleport to a square adjacent to the target. When you do so, you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against the target and a +5 power bonus to damage rolls against it until the end of your turn.

Seeker of Shadow.name: Seeker of Shadow
Seeker of Shadow.flavor: Right as combat begins, you disappear into the shadows.
Seeker of Shadow.effect: You gain a +4 power bonus to your next damage roll. In addition, you become invisible and silent until you hit an enemy or until the end of the encounter. After hitting the enemy, you remain invisible and silent until the end of your next turn.

Slayer's Endurance.name: Slayer's Endurance
Slayer's Endurance.flavor: You draw the comforting darkness close, allowing shadows to carry away the pain of your wounds.
Slayer's Endurance.effect: The first time an enemy takes damage from your assassin’s shroud before the end of your next turn, you gain 5 temporary hit points for each shroud on that enemy.

Dark Step Ambush.name: Dark Step Ambush
Dark Step Ambush.flavor: You step from your foe’s shadow to deliver a deadly attack, then hide in the tatters of the foe’s soul.
Dark Step Ambush.effect: Before the attack, you teleport 5 squares to a square adjacent to your assassin’s shroud target.
Dark Step Ambush.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you become invisible until the end of your next turn.

Flurry of Talons.name: Flurry of Talons
Flurry of Talons.flavor: You fly toward your foe in the shape of a dozen shadows, each winged and fanged. After savaging your foe, you return to your normal form.
Flurry of Talons.effect: Before the attack, you fly your speed to a square adjacent to an enemy. This movement doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks.
Flurry of Talons.attack: Dexterity vs. Reflex. Make three attack rolls. If any of them hit, resolve them as a single hit, and all of them must miss for the attack to miss.
Flurry of Talons.onHit: 1d8 + Dexterity modifier damage if one of the attack rolls hits, 2d8 + Dexterity modifier damage if two hit, and 3d8 + Dexterity modifier damage if three hit.

Slayer in the Dark.name: Slayer in the Dark
Slayer in the Dark.flavor: Darkness clouds the eyes of your enemy, and you manipulate its fears, causing it to slash in a panic when its allies approach.
Slayer in the Dark.onHit: 1d10 + Dexterity modifier psychic damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn. Until this blindness ends, you can use an opportunity action to compel the target to make a melee basic attack as a free action against any enemy that enters a square adjacent to the target. The target makes the attack without the penalty to attack rolls from being blinded.
Slayer in the Dark.nightStalker: The target makes the attack with a power bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls equal to your Charisma modifier.

Well of Shades.name: Well of Shades
Well of Shades.flavor: Freezing shadows stretch out from you and pull your enemies close before you vanish.
Well of Shades.onHit: 2d6 + Dexterity modifier cold damage, and you pull the target 2 squares.
Well of Shades.bleakDisciple: The target is also slowed until the end of your next turn.
Well of Shades.effect: You either teleport 5 squares or become invisible until the end of your next turn.

Bleak Gallows.name: Bleak Gallows
Bleak Gallows.flavor: Shadows coalesce into a black gallows, and a noose of force drops around your foe’s neck.
Bleak Gallows.effect: You conjure a gallows in an unoccupied square adjacent to the target. The gallows occupies its square, and it lasts until the end of the encounter. The gallows can be attacked and has 35 hit points. Until the gallows vanishes, you can use a free action to teleport the target to a square adjacent to the gallows at the end of each of the target’s turns.

Death's Doorstep.name: Death's Doorstep
Death's Doorstep.flavor: As your weapon strikes your foe, you open a channel from your tainted shadow into its soul, making it easier to shroud it and tear it to shreds.
Death's Doorstep.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you attack the target and invoke your shrouds on it, a shroud is not subtracted if that attack misses.

Shade Venom.name: Shade Venom
Shade Venom.flavor: Your weapon becomes covered with a translucent, gray poison. When you strike your foe, the poison gives life to your foe’s shadow, turning it into a malevolent beast.
Shade Venom.effect: The target is affected by your shade venom (save ends). Until this effect ends, you can use an opportunity action at the start of each of the target’s turns to compel it to make a melee basic attack against itself with combat advantage. The target can make a saving throw against this effect only on a turn during which it hit itself with the melee basic attack.

Sundered Shadow.name: Sundered Shadow
Sundered Shadow.flavor: You slice into your foe’s shadow and grasp it. Now your foe cannot escape your attacks.
Sundered Shadow.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against the target, and you can make melee attacks against the target even when it is beyond your melee reach.
Sundered Shadow.onMiss: Half damage. Until the end of your next turn, you can make melee attacks against the target even when it is beyond your melee reach.

Assassin's Defense.name: Assassin's Defense
Assassin's Defense.flavor: Infused with your umbral magic, your foe’s shadow betrays the foe, giving away its attack a split second beforehand so that you can vanish.
Assassin's Defense.trigger: Your assassin’s shroud target hits you
Assassin's Defense.effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses against the triggering enemy’s attack. After the attack is resolved, you become invisible until the end of your next turn.

Liquid Shadow.name: Liquid Shadow
Liquid Shadow.flavor: As your foe strikes, you become a creature of shadow and then pursue that enemy.
Liquid Shadow.effect: You take half damage from the attack. At the end of the triggering enemy’s current turn, you can use a free action to teleport to a square adjacent to it.

Shadow Meld.name: Shadow Meld
Shadow Meld.flavor: You vanish into your own shadow.
Shadow Meld.effect: You shift 2 squares. Until the start of your next turn, enemies cannot attack you, and they have neither line of sight nor line of effect to you.

Thief of Names.name: Thief of Names
Thief of Names.flavor: You peer into the Shadowfell, draw forth the shade of a creature, and craft its shadow stuff into a disguise.
Thief of Names.effect:
Choose a Medium or smaller humanoid creature that you have seen. You become an illusory duplicate of that creature, though you still carry your own gear. This illusion lasts until you end it as a free action or until your next extended rest. You gain a +5 power bonus to Bluff checks to convince others that you are the creature.
    If you take damage from a melee or a ranged attack while you are adjacent to the creature, you take only half damage, and the creature takes the same amount of damage. You gain this benefit neither against the creature’s attacks nor against attacks that target both of you.

Mob of Shadows.name: Mob of Shadows
Mob of Shadows.flavor: You slice your foe’s shadow to pieces. Each piece forms a miniature copy of you and stands next to the foe, weapon poised.
Mob of Shadows.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. The attack creates a zone that fills the squares adjacent to the target. The zone lasts until the end of your next turn. When any enemy enters the zone, you can use an opportunity action to deal damage to that enemy equal to your Dexterity modifier. If you do so, that enemy is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Mob of Shadows.bleakDisciple: Add your Constitution modifier to the damage dealt by the zone.

Shadow Fire.name: Shadow Fire
Shadow Fire.flavor: You stab at your foe three times, and each strike creates an inky blot on it that erupts into flickering, ebony flares.
Shadow Fire.attack: Dexterity vs. AC. Make three attack rolls. If any of them hit, resolve them as a single hit, and all of them must miss for the attack to miss.
Shadow Fire.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier fire damage if one of the attack rolls hits, 2[W] + Dexterity modifier fire damage if two hit, and 3[W] + Dexterity modifier fire damage if three hit. In addition, you become invisible until the end of your next turn.

Shadowed Deception.name: Shadowed Deception
Shadowed Deception.flavor: In your foe’s eyes, you take on a form so terrifying that you cow it utterly.
Shadowed Deception.onHit: 3d10 + Dexterity modifier psychic damage, and the target cannot attack you until the end of your next turn.
Shadowed Deception.nightStalker: The target also grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Traitorous Shadow.name: Traitorous Shadow
Traitorous Shadow.flavor: Your foe’s shadow writhes as it gains a malevolent will of its own. The moment the foe drops its guard, the shadow strikes.
Traitorous Shadow.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. During the target’s next turn, the target falls prone after moving without shifting or after making a ranged or an area attack.

Consign to Shadow.name: Consign to Shadow
Consign to Shadow.flavor: Your attack taints your enemy with the essence of the Shadowfell and creates a bond between you two, which causes you both to fade away for a few moments.
Consign to Shadow.effect: You create a shadow bond that lasts until the end of your next turn. Until the bond ends, both you and the target become insubstantial to every combatant but each other, the target’s allies don’t have line of effect to it, and you can use a move action to teleport to a square adjacent to the target.
Consign to Shadow.sustainMinor: The shadow bond persists. You can sustain the bond only if the target has at least 1 hit point.

Executioner's Blade.name: Executioner's Blade
Executioner's Blade.flavor: Having studied your foe, you are ready to deliver a killing blow. Your foe might dodge or parry your strike, but in the end, it cannot escape you.
Executioner's Blade.effect: If you invoked your shrouds on the target as part of this attack, a shroud is not subtracted if the attack misses.

Guild of Shadows.name: Guild of Shadows
Guild of Shadows.flavor: Three ebon duplicates of yourself appear, eager to aid you in slaying your foes.
Guild of Shadows.effect: You conjure three shadowy duplicates of yourself in 3 unoccupied squares in the burst. The duplicates occupy their spaces, and they last until the end of your next turn. Whenever you use a move action, you can also move each duplicate 5 squares. You can flank enemies with the duplicates, but your allies cannot. Any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to one or more of the duplicates takes 5 damage.
Guild of Shadows.sustainMinor: The duplicates persist, and each one makes the following melee attack against a different creature.
Guild of Shadows.target: One creature adjacent to the duplicate

Phantom Assault.name: Phantom Assault
Phantom Assault.flavor: With each of your blows, shadows flit around your enemy, distracting it and allowing you to remain hidden from its sight.
Phantom Assault.effect: You become invisible to the target until the end of your next turn. In addition, whenever you hit the target with a shadow attack before the end of the encounter, you become invisible to it until the end of your next turn.

Assassin's Eye.name: Assassin's Eye
Assassin's Eye.flavor: Shadows briefly guide your attacks, ensuring that no hindrance can stop your hexes from reaching your enemies.
Assassin's Eye.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you ignore penalties to your attack rolls and damage rolls, and you ignore the weakened condition and your targets’ resistances.

Claim the Dead.name: Claim the Dead
Claim the Dead.flavor: As your foe’s soul passes to the Shadowfell, you drain a portion of its essence for your own use.
Claim the Dead.trigger: You reduce your assassin’s shroud target to 0 hit points on your turn
Claim the Dead.effect: You can spend a healing surge and regain 15 additional hit points. In addition, you gain an extra move action that you can use during either this turn or your next turn.

Fortress of Shadow.name: Fortress of Shadow
Fortress of Shadow.flavor: Darkness swirls around you, shielding you from your foes’ eyes.
Fortress of Shadow.effect: You become invisible until the end of your next turn.

Soul of Death.name: Soul of Death
Soul of Death.flavor: Having nearly touched death, you become an avatar of the killer’s art.
Soul of Death.trigger: You drop to 0 hit points or fewer
Soul of Death.effect: You regain hit points as if you had spent a healing surge. In addition, you use your assassin’s shroud up to four times against an enemy you can see.

Cruel Shadows.name: Cruel Shadows
Cruel Shadows.flavor: Your attack bends and twists your enemy’s shadow, causing it to terrify that enemy.
Cruel Shadows.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier psychic damage. Until the end of your next turn, you can slide the target 3 squares as a free action when any creature ends its turn adjacent to the target.
Cruel Shadows.nightStalker: The target also grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Obsidian Spiders.name: Obsidian Spiders
Obsidian Spiders.flavor: With a gesture, you cause the shadows around your foes to transform into black spiders, which swarm over them and deliver dozens of poisonous bites.
Obsidian Spiders.attack: Dexterity vs. Fortitude. If the target is your assassin’s shroud target, you gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll.

Shadow Swap.name: Shadow Swap
Shadow Swap.flavor: As you strike at your foe, your shadows mingle.
Shadow Swap.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. The next time you are subjected to an effect that a save can end before the end of your next turn, the target is also subjected to that effect.
Shadow Swap.bleakDisciple: When the target is subjected to the effect that a save can end, the target takes damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Wraith's Assault.name: Wraith's Assault
Wraith's Assault.flavor: You move through your enemies like a shadow, advancing on your chosen foe despite the defenses around it.
Wraith's Assault.effect: Before the attack, you fly your speed + 4, and you gain phasing and become insubstantial during the movement.

Assassin's Scalpel.name: Assassin's Scalpel
Assassin's Scalpel.flavor: You ready the perfect attack to slay your foe, confident that you can score the killing blow under the right circumstances.
Assassin's Scalpel.attack: Dexterity vs. AC. You can score a critical hit on a roll of 18–20. After making the attack roll, you can turn the attack into a miss.

Folded Shadow.name: Folded Shadow
Folded Shadow.flavor: As you lunge at your enemy, your blade slices deep into it, and you disappear into its shadow.
Folded Shadow.effect: You shift 1 square into the target’s space and remain there until the end of your next turn. While there, you are insubstantial, you move with the target (this movement doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks), and any melee or ranged attack that misses you hits the target instead, unless the target is the attacker. When the effect ends, you slide 1 square to a square adjacent to the target.

Reaper's Touch.name: Reaper's Touch
Reaper's Touch.flavor: With an innocuous tap, you place an echo of death energy into your foe’s body and soul.
Reaper's Touch.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you hit the target with a shadow attack, it takes a –5 penalty to saving throws against this power’s ongoing damage until the end of your next turn.

Wall of Death.name: Wall of Death
Wall of Death.flavor: You call forth a shadowy construct built from the shards of your previous victims. It howls in pain and lashes out with long tendrils as the souls trapped within seek to escape.
Wall of Death.effect: You conjure a wall of darkness that lasts until the end of your next turn. The wall can be up to 4 squares high, and it blocks line of sight for creatures other than you. Any enemy that starts its turn in the wall or adjacent to it takes 15 necrotic damage, plus 5 damage for each of your shrouds on that enemy. Whenever a creature drops to 0 hit points or fewer within 5 squares of the wall, the wall’s length can increase by 2 squares.

Ambush from Thin Air.name: Ambush from Thin Air
Ambush from Thin Air.flavor: You appear suddenly next to your foe and make a deadly attack.
Ambush from Thin Air.effect: Before the attack, you teleport 20 squares to a square adjacent to your assassin’s shroud target. This teleportation does not require line of sight.

Last Word.name: Last Word
Last Word.flavor: Having studied your enemy, you are now ready to end its life with a single strike.
Last Word.effect: If you invoked your shrouds on the target as part of the attack, roll d12s instead of d6s for that damage.

Reaper in Black.name: Reaper in Black
Reaper in Black.flavor: In your foe’s eyes, you become an avatar of death. Your presence is enough to hold the foe rapt with fear, and your other enemies sense that creature’s impending doom.
Reaper in Black.onHit: 3d10 + Dexterity modifier psychic damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn. In addition, you slide each enemy within 5 squares of the target 1 square.
Reaper in Black.nightStalker: The number of squares you slide each enemy equals 3.

Shadows of Doom.name: Shadows of Doom
Shadows of Doom.flavor: Your foe’s shadow writhes as it gains a malevolent will of its own. It strikes the moment your foe lets its guard down.
Shadows of Doom.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target takes 3 damage each time it takes any action other than a free action.
Shadows of Doom.bleakDisciple: The target instead takes damage equal to your Constitution modifier each time it takes any action other than a free action.

Doom Foretold.name: Doom Foretold
Doom Foretold.flavor: As your weapon slices your foe, you lay bare the root of its doom. Your next strike is the last one you’ll need.
Doom Foretold.effect: You use your assassin’s shroud against the target up to four times.

Intent to Murder.name: Intent to Murder
Intent to Murder.flavor: You have studied your foe long enough. Now is the time to end its life.
Intent to Murder.target: One enemy that has four of your shrouds on it
Intent to Murder.onHit: Damage equal to your bloodied value, or twice that if the target is helpless.
Intent to Murder.onMiss: Damage equal to your healing surge value, or twice that if the target is helpless.

Shadow Puppet.name: Shadow Puppet
Shadow Puppet.flavor: You reach into your foe’s shadow and rip away part of its essence, which you use to manipulate the foe like a puppet.
Shadow Puppet.onHit: 4d8 + Dexterity modifier psychic damage, and the target is dominated (save ends). Until the target saves against this effect, when any enemy leaves a square adjacent to the target or makes a ranged attack while adjacent to it, you can use an opportunity action to compel the target to make a melee basic attack as a free action against that enemy.
Shadow Puppet.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dominated until the end of your next turn.

Three Shadow Venoms.name: Three Shadow Venoms
Three Shadow Venoms.flavor: You draw the essence of shadow into your weapon and transform it into a deadly mixture of three poisons.
Three Shadow Venoms.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is weakened (save ends) and takes ongoing 15 poison damage (save ends).
Three Shadow Venoms.onMiss: Half damage, and the target takes a –5 penalty to damage rolls (save ends) and takes ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends).

Contrivance of Speed.name: Contrivance of Speed
Contrivance of Speed.flavor: Your deft speed and skill allow you to move around combat effortlessly.
Contrivance of Speed.effect: You enter the contrivance of speed stance. Until the stance ends, you can shift 2 squares as a move action.

Shadow Adept.name: Shadow Adept
Shadow Adept.flavor: You have mastered the art of bending light, which makes you extremely difficult to locate.
Shadow Adept.trigger: You are hidden and become no longer hidden from an enemy.
Shadow Adept.effect: You teleport 3 squares to a space where you have cover or concealment from an enemy and can make a Stealth check to hide.

Vaporous Step.name: Vaporous Step
Vaporous Step.flavor: A swift prayer enhances the prowess of your group.
Vaporous Step.target: You and each ally within 5 squares of you
Vaporous Step.effect: The target shifts 2 squares as a free action.
Vaporous Step.sustainMove: You and each ally within 5 squares gains the effects of this power again.

Converging Shadows.name: Converging Shadows
Converging Shadows.flavor: Darkness gathers to shelter you from harm
Converging Shadows.trigger: You are targeted by a melee or ranged attack
Converging Shadows.effect: You gain concealment until the end of your next turn. If the Triggering attack misses, you can make a Stealth check to hide.

Darkening Veil.name: Darkening Veil
Darkening Veil.flavor: You punch a hole into the Shadowfell to call forth dark mist in billowing plumes.
Darkening Veil.effect: After the Triggering attack is resolved, teleport 5 squares into an unoccupied square adjacent to or inside the zone.
Darkening Veil.requirement: The power Darkening Veil must be active in order to use this power.
Darkening Veil.trigger: You take damage from an attack

Spectral Assailants.name: Spectral Assailants
Spectral Assailants.flavor: Your enemies’ shadows come to life to claw and menace as you direct, creating the perfect distraction so you can beat a hasty retreat.
Spectral Assailants.onHit: 2d6 + Dexterity modifier necrotic damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target cannot take opportunity actions, and you can slide the target 1 square as a free action each time it takes damage.
Spectral Assailants.effect: You can use shadow step as a minor action until the end of your next turn.

Blood Shadows.name: Blood Shadows
Blood Shadows.flavor: Your enemy’s spilled vitality calls forth animate darkness to aid your bloody work.
Blood Shadows.special: If you are hidden from the target, you can teleport 2 squares to a square adjacent to the target before the attack.
Blood Shadows.effect: You conjure four blood shadows in 4 different unoccupied squares within 5 squares of the target. The blood shadows occupy their squares and last until the end of the encounter. The blood shadows can be attacked; each is insubstantial and has 8 hit points. The blood shadows count as creatures for the purpose of your shadow step power, and bloodied enemies grant combat advantage while adjacent to a blood shadow.

Gloaming Call.name: Gloaming Call
Gloaming Call.flavor: Swirling black plumes gush from the ground, offering shelter from and passage to your prey.
Gloaming Call.effect: You teleport to a square that one gloaming you can see is in and become invisible until the start of your next turn. That gloaming is consumed.
Gloaming Call.requirement: The power Gloaming Call must be active in order to use this power.
Gloaming Call.trigger: You take damage from an attack

Shadow Knives.name: Shadow Knives
Shadow Knives.flavor: Inky darkness flows from your body, and within its blackest depths are the instruments of your opponent’s defeat.
Shadow Knives.effect: Before the attack, you can shift 1 square.
Shadow Knives.requirement: The power Shadow Knives must be active in order to use this power.
Shadow Knives.trigger: An enemy starts its turn within the zone
Shadow Knives.onHit: 1[W] damage, and the target is slowed and dazed until the end of its next turn.
Shadow Knives.onMiss: You teleport to any unoccupied square within the zone.
Shadow Knives.aftereffect: You become invisible and you can teleport up to 5 squares.

Murderous Shadow.name: Murderous Shadow
Murderous Shadow.flavor: Your opponent’s shadow comes to life, warping and twisting until it becomes your monstrous thrall.
Murderous Shadow.effect: You summon a Medium murderous shadow in a square adjacent to one enemy in range. The murderous shadow has the adjacent enemy’s speed and all its movement modes. The shadow also has insubstantial, phasing, and vulnerable 5 radiant. You can give the murderous shadow the following special commands.
Murderous Shadow.standardAction: The shadow teleports 5 squares and makes the following attack at the end of this movement: close burst 1 (creatures in the burst); Dexterity vs. Will; 1d6 + Dexterity modifier psychic damage, and the shade slides the target 1 square.
Murderous Shadow.instinctiveEffect: If you haven’t given the shadow any commands by the end of your turn, it uses its first attack against a random creature adjacent to it.

Gloaming Dance.name: Gloaming Dance
Gloaming Dance.flavor: Shadow energy bleeds from you, whisking you away to the Shadowfell at your command.
Gloaming Dance.effect: You enter the stance of the twilight dance. Until the stance ends, add 2 to the number of squares you teleport using shadow step. In addition, whenever you miss your assassin’s shroud target with an attack in which you invoked your shrouds, you become invisible until the start of your next turn.

Garrote Strangle.name: Garrote Strangle
Garrote Strangle.flavor: You wait for the perfect moment when your foe is within reach, then strangle it with your garrote.
Garrote Strangle.requirement: You must use this power with a garrote.
Garrote Strangle.effect: You shift up to 2 squares before the attack.
Garrote Strangle.target: One creature you are hidden from
Garrote Strangle.onHit:
2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is grabbed until the end of your next turn. While the grab persists, the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls against you and cannot speak, and you cannot make other attacks.
    Level 21: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.
Garrote Strangle.sustainStandard:
The grab persists, and the target takes 2[W] + your Dexterity modifier damage.
    Level 21: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.

Poisoned Dagger.name: Poisoned Dagger
Poisoned Dagger.flavor: Your piercing blade delivers poisons quickly and cleanly, making them difficult to shake off.
Poisoned Dagger.requirement: You must use this power with a dagger.
Poisoned Dagger.onHit:
1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. If you deliver an assassin poison with this attack, the target takes a -4 penalty to its first saving throw, if any, against the poison’s effect.
    Level 21: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.
Poisoned Dagger.effect: If the dagger has an assassin poison on it that is normally delivered on a hit, you can deliver that poison to the target even if the attack misses.

Quick Lunge.name: Quick Lunge
Quick Lunge.flavor: You lunge forward quickly, upending your foe with a kick and a thrust of your weapon.
Quick Lunge.effect: You shift 1 square before the attack.
Quick Lunge.onHit:
1[W] damage, and you knock the target prone. You can then shift 1 square back to your starting position.
    Level 21: 2[W] damage.

Bola Takedown.name: Bola Takedown
Bola Takedown.flavor: You whirl your bola over your head and take careful aim before hurling it at a foe’s legs.
Bola Takedown.requirement: You must use this power with a bola.
Bola Takedown.onHit:
1[W] damage, and the target falls prone.
    Level 21: 2[W] damage.

Precision Dart.name: Precision Dart
Precision Dart.flavor: The poisoned dart flies from your blowgun with unerring accuracy.
Precision Dart.requirement: You must use this power with a blowgun.
Precision Dart.onHit:
1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. If you deliver an assassin poison with this attack, the target takes a -4 penalty to its first saving throw, if any, against the poison’s effect.
    Level 21: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.
Precision Dart.effect: If the ammunition has an assassin poison on it that is normally delivered on a hit, you can deliver that poison to the target even if the attack misses.

Quick Shot.name: Quick Shot
Quick Shot.flavor: You loose a quick bolt from your crossbow, thereby creating a momentary opening for your escape.
Quick Shot.requirement: You must use this power with a hand crossbow.
Quick Shot.onHit:
1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.
    Level 21: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.
Quick Shot.special: Using this power doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks.

Assassin's Strike.name: Assassin's Strike
Assassin's Strike.flavor: You strike with precision at the exact right moment, landing an attack that can be instantly fatal.
Assassin's Strike.trigger: You hit a creature within 5 squares of you with an attack using a weapon.
Assassin's Strike.effect:
The target takes 1d10 extra damage from the triggering attack. If the target is helpless, this damage is maximized.
    Level 3: 2d10 extra damage.
    Level 7: 3d10 extra damage.
    Level 13: 4d10 extra damage.
    Level 17: 5d10 extra damage.
    Level 23: 6d10 extra damage.
    Level 27: 7d10 extra damage.
Assassin's Strike.special: Nothing but a short or an extended rest can allow you to regain the use of this power.

Distracting Illusion.name: Distracting Illusion
Distracting Illusion.flavor: The image of a creature flickers and then solidifies as you craft an illusion meant to cover your dark deeds.
Distracting Illusion.effect: You create the illusion of a Medium creature of your choice in an unoccupied square in the burst. The illusion is silent but moves and acts as though it was the creature it appears to be. Creatures that closely examine the illusion can make an Insight check to discover the illusion for what it really is. The check is opposed by a Bluff check that you make when you create the illusion. The illusion lasts until the end of your next turn.
Distracting Illusion.sustainMinor: The illusion persists until the end of your next turn, and you can move it up to 6 squares.

Silent Stalker.name: Silent Stalker
Silent Stalker.flavor: You pad quietly toward your victim, unseen and unheard.
Silent Stalker.effect: You move up to your speed to a square within 2 squares of an enemy. You remain hidden until the end of this turn or until you make an attack.

Summon the Mists.name: Summon the Mists
Summon the Mists.flavor: A thick fog rises around you.
Summon the Mists.effect: The burst creates a zone of lightly obscured squares that lasts until the end of the encounter.

Ghost of the Rooftops.name: Ghost of the Rooftops
Ghost of the Rooftops.flavor: Your skill at climbing and leaping allows you to move across the rooftops unhindered.
Ghost of the Rooftops.effect: You climb or make a long jump, moving a number of squares up to your speed, without making an Athletics check.
Ghost of the Rooftops.special: You can use this power only once per round.

Darkness.name: Darkness
Darkness.flavor: A cloud of pure shadow expands from you, shrouding the area in darkness.
Darkness.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. To creatures other than you, the zone is totally obscured and blocks line of sight.
Darkness.sustainMinor: The zone persists until the end of your next turn. You must be in the zone to sustain it.

Vanish.name: Vanish
Vanish.flavor: Without warning you disappear from the sight of all around you. By the time you reappear, you are far from where you once stood.
Vanish.trigger: You are hit by an attack.
Vanish.effect: You become invisible until the start of your next turn, and you teleport up to your speed.

Hidden Stab.name: Hidden Stab
Hidden Stab.flavor: With a quick grab from behind, you cause your enemy to lower its defenses, allowing you to land a deadly blow even as they struggle to break free.
Hidden Stab.requirement: You must have a hand free and use this power with a light blade.
Hidden Stab.onHit:
1[W] damage, and the target is grabbed until the end of your next turn. While the grab persists, the target grants combat advantage, and it takes a -2 penalty to its first escape attempt. If you make a melee weapon attack against the target before the grab ends and your assassin’s strike is not expended, you can use that power against the target even if the attack misses.
    Level 21: 2[W] damage.
Hidden Stab.sustainMinor: The grab persists until the end of your next turn.

Death Mark.name: Death Mark
Death Mark.flavor: A black mark appears on the target’s form, appearing to be burned in with a hot iron. It warns of impending death.
Death Mark.effect: Until the end of your next extended rest, you always know the direction and approximate distance to the target. In addition, the target cannot become invisible to you.

Eyes Unseen.name: Eyes Unseen
Eyes Unseen.flavor: You conjure a sensor of shadow that appears nearby and allows you to see through walls and other barriers.
Eyes Unseen.effect: Choose a square within 5 squares of you, even a square on the other side of blocking terrain. Until the end of your next turn, you can see and hear from that square, as well as from your own.

Walk Through Shadow.name: Walk Through Shadow
Walk Through Shadow.flavor: A swirling mass of shadow surrounds you before transporting you instantaneously a short distance.
Walk Through Shadow.effect: You teleport up to 5 squares. You do not need line of sight to the destination space. If you try to teleport into a space that you cannot occupy, the teleportation is negated.

Untraceable Step.name: Untraceable Step
Untraceable Step.flavor: The air wavers for a moment before a veil of invisibility covers you from head to toe.
Untraceable Step.effect: You become invisible and move up to your speed. You remain invisible until the end of your next turn.

Shadow Coffin.name: Shadow Coffin
Shadow Coffin.flavor: You trap the target of your assassination in a small object, which keeps the body out of sight until you are ready to release it.
Shadow Coffin.trigger: You kill an adjacent creature and don’t already have a corpse trapped by this power.
Shadow Coffin.effect: The target disappears and is trapped in a nonmagical object of your choice on your person (such as a handheld mirror, a small gem, or a piece of jewelry). The target remains trapped until you release it or until the object is destroyed. To release the target into an adjacent square, you must hold the object and concentrate for 1 minute.

Ignore Barriers.name: Ignore Barriers
Ignore Barriers.flavor: Your physical form becomes as unstable as a shadow, allowing you to step through physical barriers with ease.
Ignore Barriers.effect: You are phasing until the end of the encounter.

Assassin's Strike (Hybrid).name: Assassin's Strike (Hybrid)
Assassin's Strike (Hybrid).flavor: You strike with precision at the exact right moment, landing an attack that can be instantly fatal.
Assassin's Strike (Hybrid).trigger: You hit a creature within 5 squares of you with an attack using a weapon.
Assassin's Strike (Hybrid).effect:
The target takes 1d10 extra damage from the triggering attack. If the target is helpless, this damage is maximized.
    Level 11: 2d10 extra damage.
    Level 21: 3d10 extra damage.
Assassin's Strike (Hybrid).special: Nothing but a short or an extended rest can allow you to regain the use of this power.

Black Flame Form.name: Black Flame Form
Black Flame Form.flavor: The shadows nearby deepen as dark flames erupt from your body, enveloping and protecting you.
Black Flame Form.effect:
You assume a dark, fiery form that lasts until you make an attack roll or until the end of your next turn. While in this form, you gain resist 5 to all damage, and any creature that hits you with a melee attack takes 5 fire and necrotic damage. When you assume this form, you can use your assassin’s shroud power once as part of the same action. This use of assassin’s shroud does not count against the limit on the number of times per round you can use that power.
    Level 11: The resistance and damage increase to 10.
    Level 21: The resistance and damage increase to 15.
Black Flame Form.sustainMinor: The form persists until the end of your next turn.

Ninja-to Rush.name: Ninja-to Rush
Ninja-to Rush.flavor: Coming from an unexpected direction, surprise and momentum combine to form a powerful strike.
Ninja-to Rush.requirement: You must use this power with a short sword.
Ninja-to Rush.attack: Dexterity vs. AC. If you have jumped, fallen, or flown this turn, you gain combat advantage against the target for this attack.
Ninja-to Rush.onHit:
1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.
    Level 21: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.
Ninja-to Rush.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Poisonous Shuriken.name: Poisonous Shuriken
Poisonous Shuriken.flavor: Your foes barely feel it when the sharp metal pierces their skin. They certainly feel it after that.
Poisonous Shuriken.requirement: You must use this power with shuriken.
Poisonous Shuriken.special: If you deliver an assassin poison with this attack, it applies to each target hit by this attack, even if the poison would normally be applied to only a single piece of ammunition.

Whirling Kusari-gama.name: Whirling Kusari-gama
Whirling Kusari-gama.flavor: Though your foe is watching the chain, it really should be watching the sickle.
Whirling Kusari-gama.requirement: You must use this power with a kusari-gama.
Whirling Kusari-gama.onHit: Dexterity modifier damage, and the target falls prone. You can shift 1 square and make the secondary attack with the secondary end of the kusari-gama.

Smoke Bomb.name: Smoke Bomb
Smoke Bomb.flavor: With an alchemical concoction mixed with a bit of shadow magic, you conjure a wall of smoke to cover your escape.
Smoke Bomb.trigger: An enemy enters a square adjacent to you.
Smoke Bomb.effect: The burst creates a lightly obscured zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. You can then shift up to your speed.

Feathery Tread.name: Feathery Tread
Feathery Tread.flavor: Even the sea cannot keep you from your target.
Feathery Tread.effect: Until the start of your next turn, you float an inch above the ground. You ignore difficult terrain and can both move across liquid and stand on it as if it were solid ground.

Veil of a Thousand Faces.name: Veil of a Thousand Faces
Veil of a Thousand Faces.flavor: You shed your identity as easily as you shed your clothes.
Veil of a Thousand Faces.prerequisite: You must have the Flawless Disguise class feature.
Veil of a Thousand Faces.effect: You craft a new disguise. You gain a +2 power bonus to the Bluff checks made to prevent detection.

Blinding Menace.name: Blinding Menace
Blinding Menace.sourceRef: Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook
Blinding Menace.flavor: Cloaking yourself in nightmare, you hide from any creature that might interfere with your attack against your foe.
Blinding Menace.effect: Until the end of your next turn or until you attack, you are invisible to all enemies other than the target, including those that have blindsight or tremorsense.
